constuctors.name: Network
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the System.Network class.

methods.name: communitiesLanding
methods.description: Returns a Page Reference to the default landing page for the community. This is the first tab of the community.

methods.name: forwardToAuthPage
methods.description: Returns a Page Reference to the default login page. StartURL is included as a query paremeter for where to redirect after a successful login.

methods.name: getLoginUrl
methods.description: Returns the absolute URL of the login page used by the community.

methods.name: getLogoutUrl
methods.description: Returns the absolute URL of the logout page used by the community.

methods.name: getSelfRegUrl
methods.description: Returns the absolute URL of the self-registration page used by the community.

methods.name: loadAllPackageDefaultNetworkDashboardSettings
methods.description: Maps the dashboards from the Salesforce Communities Management package onto each community’s unconfigured dashboard settings. Returns the number of settings it configures.

methods.name: loadAllPackageDefaultNetworkPulseSettings
methods.description: Maps the Insights reports from the Salesforce Communities Management package onto each community’s unconfigured Insights settings. Returns the number of settings it configures.
